description:
Take the pressure off on your commute or rides around town. This saddle is tailored to those who typically sit at a more upright (60-degree) spine angle. The shape is just a little on the wide side, to accommodate the sit bones being further back. Additionally, the flexible Royalgel padding reduces peak pressure by up to 40%.

  • Tasteful silver anti-scuff caps at sides prevent scratches
  • Sealed surface is partially transparent, allowing riders to observe how the Royalgel padding flexes and reacts
  • Integrated clip system allows easy attachment of lights or saddle bags
name: Selle Royal Lookin Moderate Saddle - Men's
